name: NEDOCROMIL SODIUM - CROMOGLICATE AND RELATED THERAPY
breadcrumbs:
3.3 Cromoglicate
and related therapy, leukotriene receptor antagonists, and phosphodiesterase
type-4 inhibitors
cautions:
Cautions  
(From 3.3.1 Cromoglicate and related therapy: British National Formulary)
3.3.1 Cromoglicate and related therapy above
side-effects:
Side-effects 
(From 3.3.1 Cromoglicate and related therapy: British National Formulary)
3.3.1 Cromoglicate and related therapy above; also nausea,
vomiting, dyspepsia, abdominal pain, pharyngitis; rarely taste disturbances
doses:
By aerosol inhalation, adult and child over 6 years 4 mg (2 puffs)
4 times daily, when control achieved may be possible to reduce to
twice daily

side-effects: Side-effects burning and stinging; distinctive taste reported
doses:

daily
